project_identification.project_name: VTransact DigiTB â€“ EGYPT Governmental Payments

modules: Product & Sub-product Management (Tax, Customs, Universal Collections)
user_journeys: Corporate user onboarding and entitlement assignment
Multi-step payment workflow (initiate, verify, approve, release)
Download payment receipts and audit logs
approval_processes: Sequential and non-sequential multi-level payment approval

integrations: Banking core systems (for account validation and payment processing)
performance_requirements: Timely response for bill inquiry and payment initiation
Scalability for large corporate user base
Auto-rejection of unprocessed transactions after 45 days

compliance_risks: Penalties For Non-Compliance Or Data Breaches"

compliance_requirements: Penalties For Non-Compliance Or Data Breaches"

critical_paths: S Ensure No Business-Critical Or Compliance Scenario Is Skipped.
compliance_checkpoints: Driven Areas; Ensure Full Coverage Of Integrations, Security, And Performance Under Load.",
